text: İrfan Gürpınar (1943 - 7 December 2020) was a Turkish politician. He was born in Kırklareli, Turkey. He was Minister of Tourism from 1995 to 1996. Gürpınar died of COVID-19 on 7 December 2020 in Ankara at the age of 77.Eski Turizm Bakanı İrfan Gürpınar Koronavirüs nedeniyle hayatını kaybetti ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Turkish politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ankara Category:Kırklareli Province
title: İrfan Gürpınar
